title: Poseidon's Gift: The affairs of the gods
description: There is nothing more dangerous than an ambitious god and no god is more ambitious than Poseidon, the Earth-shaker. But before Poseidon can take Mt Olympus from his brother Zeus, he has to first conquer the seas by marrying the beautiful Amphitrite. Living a sheltered life, Amphitrite is terrified by the bad boy of the Greek Pantheon and for good reasons. Poseidon will stop at nothing to get what he wants even if it means blackmailing his future wife. This book is for sale to ADULT AUDIENCES ONLY. It contains sexually explicit scenes that may be considered offensive by some readers.
author: Stefan A.
